remarks: Property of an independent family of vectors with prior constrained domain and codomain.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 26-Feb-2015.)
statement:
islindf.b $e |- B = ( Base ` W ) $.
islindf.v $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.

islindf.s $e |- S = ( Scalar ` W ) $.

islindf.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` S ) $.
islindf2 $p |- ( ( W e. Y /\ I e. X /\ F : I --> B ) -> ( F LIndF W <-> A. x e. I A. k e. ( N \ { .0. } ) -. ( k .x. ( F ` x ) ) e. ( K ` ( F " ( I \ { x } ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d .0. k $.
